relations.detail: CL3M通过引入约束进一步优化了PL3M，使其在处理命名实体时表现更好。
relations.problem_addressed: 提高了对命名实体的处理能力
relations.evidence: CL3M augments L3M with knowledge-based constraints following(Roth and Yih, 2004; Denis and Baldridge, 2007). This capability is very desirable as shown by the success of the rule-based deterministic approach of Raghunathan et al.(2010) in the CoNLL shared task 2011(Pradhan et al., 2011).

relations.detail: CL3M在多个基准数据集上显著优于多遍筛子模型。
relations.problem_addressed: 提高了整体性能，特别是在命名实体聚类方面
relations.evidence: Our sieve model outperforms all systems on two out of the four evaluation corpora(ACE2004-ROTH-DEV and ACE2004-NWIRE), on all metrics.

relations.detail: CPL3M通过引入概率模型扩展了CL3M，使其能够考虑更多的提及-实体链接。
relations.problem_addressed: 增加了模型的表达能力
relations.evidence: We also present a probabilistic generalization of this model that can take into account entity-mention links by considering multiple possible coreference links.

relations.detail: CPL3M通过加入约束条件来优化CL3M，从而提高了性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 解决了CL3M中的一些低精度问题
relations.evidence: CL3M augments L3M with knowledge-based constraints following(Roth and Yih, 2004; Denis and Baldridge, 2007).
